extendedInfo.description: Elemets Attack is the game combining the beatiful graphics with the simple and breathtaking gameplay.The game is open for any ideas of improving or development.

reviews.title: A ideia \303\251 boa, mas ainda enjoa.
reviews.comment: good idea but gets boring, played to the game goes speedy... boring, deleting. The 4 shots and logics are cool, but not so entertaining for \"maintain\" the app to play more days... maybe some interesting updates can solve it. Not my style of game for now. 2*
reviews.author: A Google User
